config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalDiskSync configuration option is used in the code to determine whether disk synchronization should be performed in the PersistentJournal constructor. If _journalDiskSync is true, disk synchronization will be enabled, otherwise it will be disabled.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalDiskSync configuration depends on when the journal() method is called. If the _transientMode is false, the PersistentJournal constructor will be called with the _journalDiskSync configuration option.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalDiskSync configuration option on the system is significant as it determines whether disk synchronization will be performed. Enabling disk synchronization can ensure data durability but may also impact performance due to the overhead of disk writes.
